Text: I have Decisive Action here - I put it up Friday.  I also have Brigade Combat Team, but unfortunately it was written with a Sony cd-r back in 2000, and they used some proprietary format (non iso).  That drive is long gone, and I have to figure out a way to read this disk.  I USED to have point of attack, but I havent run across it yet.  I'm still looking.

Horrido,where are the files that come with the CD?

And the Scenario editor is corrupt or something.It wont read any files.

awesome upload.  

the series is awesome.  I will continue to help seed for the next two years. 

all you have to do is unzip and drop nomandy44 folder in your c:/programfiles/hps/ folder.  

if this is your first hps title, then create a blank hps folder in c: programfiles

good luck.
